name: Radisson Blu Farnham Estate Hotel, Cavan

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband had been to a conference here and had observed the beautiful swimming pool and spa so we went back when he was 'off duty' to have a couple of relaxing days. The porter who parked the car was a absolute star - even listened politely as husband enthused much about cars- and brought us cookies and a generous amount of fresh milk. We had a junior suite and would not choose one again as it was really only a reasonable size bedroom with very nice bathroom. It was well equipped and had a Nespresso machine which made us happy.
reviews.title: Loved the spa.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We then set off for the swimming pool and I was a bit embarrassed at having to cross reception in a robe - it didn't feel right. The swimming pool is lovely and the jacuzzi caused a serious giggling fit. I am quite small and the jets were very strong so they were just pushing me around. I thoroughly enjoyed it but can see why this pool is not for children. Swimming outside is unreal - magic! Lounging area very comfortable. Don't forget to bring your own silly hat - we have a great collection of them.
reviews.title: Not the Ashford, but very nice
Currently staying here but unsure that I will stay tomorrow night
reviews.text: Dinner in the restaurant was excellent. Nice relaxed and unobtrusive service. Breakfast was a real treat - choice and quality. Then we had the spa treatments. The spa is beautiful and the treatments were excellent. I loved the relaxation room so much that I have been looking for that colour of paint for my bathroom. Then back into the slimming pool followed by the salt cave and the Roman bath and the steam room bliss.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: That evening we 'ate' in the bar. First serious disappointment. Literally nothing on the menu I want ed to eat having long since recovered from 1970s bar food. The food was very well cooked - I could see that but I don't want club sandwich with chips for my evening meal. That is what my husband had and I ate a couple of his chips after we had shared an overpriced starter.
reviews.title: Lovely staff and beautiful surroundings-spa somewhat lacking

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Next morning a beautiful walk well signposted in the stunning grounds to try to work off a little of another excellent breakfast.
reviews.title: Could be better.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Super hotel, my wife and i have just returned fro a 3 night stay of relaxation and great food at farnham, The welcome was great. the room brilliant - junior suite in old part of the building - stunning - i liked the decor and they have done well to include a few modern treats in this cavernous old room.
reviews.title: Keeps getting better

reviews.text: People giving off about the harshness if shampoo/a pic here or there are never going to have a good time until the poker falls out!
reviews.title: Wedding with overnight stay.

reviews.text: The pool is exceptional, suna super, staff are a credit. to me this is one of the stand out hotels in Ireland. Just relax go withthe flow and enjoy it.
reviews.title: Nice

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Myself and my husband spent the 25th October at a wedding here. with an overnight stay. From the moment we arrived until our departure on Saturday afternoon, all of the staff went above and beyond to help us. I have mobility problems and also requires a special diet. I mentioned this to staff before the meal and they were so kind and did everything possible to make my stay so enjoyable. When my dessert arrived I was the envy of the whole table. Nothing seemed to be too trouble trouble for the staff.
reviews.title: Lovely weekend topped off by great staff

reviews.text: We had a very relaxed comfortable bedroom.
reviews.title: The good, the great and the things to improve on

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed here on our anniversary. The hotel was recommended by my parents who've been many times.
reviews.title: Lovely peaceful break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was lovely and the bed was really comfortable. I often have difficulty sleeping in hotels but slept like a log here - although that may also have been down to fabulous relaxing treatments in the spa and lots of country air during our walks around the estate.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel and staff.

reviews.text: Staff were lovely; always helpful and courteous. I had mentioned when booking that the trip was to celebrate our anniversary and staff had left a lovely card in our room and brought us complimentary glasses of champagne and a tray of patisserie items after our dinner on the first night.
reviews.title: Seriously lacking in value for money

reviews.text: Had an amazing Aroma Luxe massage at the spa and really enjoyed the indoor/outdoor infinity pool. The walks around the hotel are fabulous - particularly with the autumn foliage coming in.
reviews.title: Great weekend break!

reviews.text: We ate in the hotel restaurant, in the cellar bar and in the health club. Staff also booked us a taxi one night to go into Cavan and eat at The Oak Room. Food at the Oak Room was also terrific and it's a short car trip from the hotel into Cavan.
reviews.title: Late room at the inn!

reviews.text: Just back from 3 nights stay for a family wedding.
reviews.title: Strange experience

reviews.text: Beautiful, Stunning place for a wedding and the conference centre was perfect for a wedding reception, could not and would not fault a single part of this from start to finish.
reviews.title: Fails to disappoint. ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff are amazingly helpful, every single member of staff you meet are so helpful but if feels like there is a two tier approach to this training of the staff and yet with the basic standards of the hotel.
reviews.title: Thoroughly recommend this relaxing hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The valet parking staff are outstanding telling us to park the car on the roundabout check in and when we are ready then move the car, nice touch as he seemed to know we would be rushing out for a rehearsal at the church .
reviews.title: Friendly Farnham

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: You will find staff all over with nice touches like when I asked for change for the cigarette machine I was told they didn't have any change right now but would give me one of her own cigarettes until they could get change, excellent.
reviews.title: Why haven't I been here before.....

aka: Radisson Blu Farnham Estate Hotel, Cavan Hotel Cavan
description: Farnham Estate brings centuries of the very best of traditions - hospitality, welcome, natural beauty - and blends them with contemporary comfort and service, creating a destination unlike any other in Ireland. The moment you enter the driveway at Farnham Estate, you are greeted by acres of rolling countryside and a peaceful haven that can not fail to capture the spirit of relaxation. Located in the heart of this magnificent estate, just 3 km from Cavan town, is a world class Health Spa and the very stylish Radisson Blu Farnham Estate Hotel. Inside and out, Farnham is a playground for the senses. From the softest fabrics to the most delicate local ingredients, every detail has been carefully chosen to create a sense of total well-being. Guests may come to Farnham to experience the Health Spa. They may arrive in search of fine cuisine and stunning wines. Or some of the most beautiful suites in Ireland. But whatever they seek at Farnham, they will leave having rediscovered a sense of peace and harmony.
